2. Use the customer support phone number: Search for the customer support phone number of the company you're trying to contact. You can usually find it in your account information, on your invoice, or on the company's website. Dial the number and follow the instructions to speak to a live agent.

3. Explore the company's app: If the company has a mobile app, it may have a built-in feature that allows you to chat or call a live agent. Open the app and look for the "Support" or "Contact Us" section to find the live agent options.
